div.ab:
إلى القــرى
والجبايــة إلينــا
عنهم ما قد علمــت
وقد بلغني أن لبعضهم صــحا ورزق حـ
هــم فارقوها وأشخصوا عنها صــلحا
ما دخّلت عليهم في ذلك مثبت لـك
فأخّر من كان له قبلك منهم زرع حتّى
يفرغوا من حصادهم ورفع عليهم فارفعه
إلينا مع رسول من قبلك واكــتب
بتسميتهم بسمتهم وأبنياتهم وأسمايهم وعددهــم
ومن لم يكن له قبلك منهم زرع فأشخــصه
إلينا ولا توحره إن شا اللّه والسّــلم
عليك ورحمت اللّه وكتــب
خلد يوم السّبت لسبع ليال بقين
من شهر ربيع الأوّل سنة ســتّ
ومائة

*** ʾilà ăl qurà ***
wa ăl ǧibāyaẗa ʾilay nā ***
ʿan hum mā qad ʿalimta ***
wa qad balaġa nī ʾanna li baʿḍi him ṣ***ḥā wa rizq ḥ***
*** hum fāraqū hā wa ʾašḫaṣū ʿan hā ṣulḥ:an
mā daḫḫalta ʿalay him fī ḏālika muṯbat:un la ka
fa ʾaḫḫir man kāna la hu qibala ka min hum zarʿ:un ḥattà
yafruġū min ḥiṣādi him wa rufiʿa ʿalay him fa ĭrfaʿ hu
ʾilay nā maʿa rasūl:in min qibali ka wa ŭktub
bi tasmiyati simati him wa ʾabniyāti ʾasmāyi him wa ʿadadi him
wa man lam yakun la hu qibali ka min hum zarʿ:un fa ʾašḫiṣ hu
ʾilay nā wa lā tuʾaḫḫir hu ʾin šāʾa ăl lāhu wa ăs salāmu
ʿalay ka wa raḥmatu ăl lāhi wa kataba
ḫālid:un yawma ăs sabti li sabʿi layāl:in baqīna
min šahri rabīʿa ăl ʾawwali sanaẗa sitt:in
*** wa miʾaẗ:in

[…] to the villag[es
and the taxes to us [
about them what you (already) know [
I have been informed that some of them (the workmen) have been given [one or two words] and maintenance allowance [one word]
should they separate themselves from it (land or village) and depart from it peacefully.
Whatever you spend on them on that account is assured to you.
Detain those of them who are with you who have grainland [until]
they are through with their harvesting and (with the delivery of) their tax assessment. Transmit it (the tax)
to us with your emissary. Write down
their (the workmen’s) names and their buildings and their number.
And he, among those who are with you, who has no grainland have him sent
to us and do not detain him, God willing. And peace be
upon you and the grace of God. Written by
Khālid, saturday seven nigh[ts remaining]
of the month of Rabīʿ the First, year s[ix]
[…] and (one) hundred
